channel.title: Pierre Poilievre
channel.description: Recent news about Pierre Poilievre, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Lovely evening in Riverside South. New faces abound in growing suburbs. Message from the doors: keep taxes low and economy strong.

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: @kenneyjason Le grand PM Franco-canadien Laurier serait d'accord av/ vous «Le Cda est libre & la liberté est notre nationalité»

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: Gr8 2 c u! RT@TarekJerjawi:"Its always great to see you around every corner meeting people and trying to understand and address their needs"

item.title: Posted on Twitter
item.description: @kenneyjason @nenshi The great French Cdn PM Laurier would agree w/ Jason. “Canada is free and freedom is our nationality.” #liveandletlive

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
For Harper's Conservatives, Senate reform is mostly about the form
Look out Senate, here comes Pierre: Prime Minister Stephen Harper named his favourite and most loyal mudslinger, Conservative Mp Pierre Poilievre, left, minister of state for Democratic Reform, pictured with Foreign Affairs Minister John Baird on July 15 in ...

item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
PM could set Poilievre 'loose' on reforming Senate, but critics say he's 'worst ...
Conservative MP Pierre Poilievre and Foreign Affairs Minister John Baird, pictured on Monday July 15 walking into Rideau Hall before the Cabinet swearing-in ceremony. Mr. Poilievre is now the minister of state for Democratic Reform. By JESSICA BRUNO |

item.title: Mentioned by Cape Breton Post
item.description:
Poilievre just one of group of MPs rivals love to hate
On Parliament Hill, Ottawa MP Pierre Poilievre is something of a Pete Campbell. The clean-cut, often unctuous politician gets under the opposition's skin as he deflects and boomerangs back their questions in the Commons. After he was appointed to cabinet ...

item.title: Mentioned by Huffington Post Canada
item.description:
Pierre Poilievre Just One MP Rivals Love To Hate
OTTAWA - In the popular TV show Mad Men, short-clipped advertising account man Pete Campbell is the character everyone loves to hate — young, conservative, ambitious and fabulously snotty. On Parliament Hill, Ottawa MP Pierre Poilievre is something of ...
